Support for semantic actions and parser context. *

Constructor Detail

Actions

public Actions()
Method Detail

isComplete

public boolean isComplete(int id)
Determine whether a production represents a complete semantic unit. The default implementation returns true.

Parameters:
id - The production ID.
Returns:
true if the production is a complete semantc unit.

getValueType

public Actions.ValueType getValueType(int id)
Determine a production's value type. The default implementation simply returns Actions.ValueType.NODE.

Parameters:
id - The production ID.
Returns:
The corresponding value type.

getValue

public Object getValue(int id,
                       String name,
                       Pair<Object> values)
Get the semantic value for the specific production. The default implementation signals an invalid state.

Parameters:
id - The production's symbol ID.
String - The production's name.
values - The values that make up the production.
Returns:
The value of the production.

dispatch

public void dispatch(int id,
                     ForkMergeParser.Subparser subparser)
Dispatch a semantic action. Does nothing by default.

hasContext

public boolean hasContext()
Determine whether the parser requires context. The default implementation returns false.

Returns:
true if the parser has context.

getInitialContext

public Actions.Context getInitialContext()
Create the initial context. The default implementation signals an invalid state.

Returns:
The initial context.
